Description: BANDI Large Pocket Belt Description The BANDI Large Pocket Belt is the alternative to fanny packs, or bulky cell phone arm bands, providing a simple, smart solution to securely stash your stuff while traveling, exercising, or anywhere on-the-go. This belt is small and thin enough to wear under or over clothes, fitting high-hip sizes 28”-42”. BANDI offers a belt extender to fit fuller figures more comfortably. Three pockets divide and store your items so they don’t move around in the belt. BANDI’s main phone pocket size of 7.5” x 3.5” is compatible with most smart phones such as the iPhone, Google Pixel and Samsung Galaxy, also accommodating most phone cases and passports as well. The sleek clasp in the back makes this belt easy to put on and take off. Simply clip, size, and fill it. You’ll forget you have it on! You can stash your phone, keys, money, ID, medicine, nutrition bars, asthma inhaler and many other small essentials. Our belts are flip-tested, ensuring that your stuff won’t fall out when upside down. This unique storage system is made with quality in mind so it will last you several running seasons and is machine washable. We recommend washing on a cold delicate setting in a garment bag and hanging to dry. The BANDI Large Pocket Belt is easy to store because it folds up to fit in virtually any size purse or bag. Features: Sleek pocketed belt will hold even large tablet phones and passportStylish and secure, with no bulky zippers or VelcroLow-profile buckle and adjustable slide for a secure no-bounce fitDivided main pocket to separate phone from moneyExtra side pocket for keys, coins, tissues or lip balm Product Details: Shipping Weight: 1 pounds Handling We will ship most orders within 1 business day of payment.
